entity.name: users
entity.query:
SELECT id AS id, education AS u_education, profession AS u_profession, dream_for_future AS u_dream, family_preference AS u_family_preference, spouse_preference AS u_spouse_preference, settled_in AS u_location, settle_else AS u_relocate, virginity_opinion AS u_virginity_opinion, ideal_marriage AS u_ideal_marriage, ideal_partner AS u_ideal_partner, sex AS u_sex, further_education_plans AS u_further_education, short_bio AS u_about_me, sexual_preference AS u_sexual_preference
FROM users
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT id FROM USERS WHERE updated_at > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' OR created_at > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: hobbies
entity.query: SELECT hobby AS u_hobbies FROM hobbies WHERE user_id=${users.id}
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT id FROM hobbies WHERE updated_at > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: SELECT id FROM users WHERE id=${hobbies.user_id}
